name: eset-protect-enterprise
label: ESET Protect Enterprise
description: ESET Protect Enterprise extended detection and response (XDR) that delivers enterprise-grade visibility, threat hunting and response options.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: base_url
fields.description: URL for the ESET Enterprise server from where the connector gets notifications.

fields.title: Username
fields.name: server_username
fields.description: Username to access the ESET Enterprise server.

fields.title: Password
fields.name: server_password
fields.description: Password to access the ESET Enterprise server.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified. By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: List Endpoints
operations.description: List all endpoints from ESET Enterprise Server.

operations.title: List Events
operations.description: List all events from ESET Enterprise Server.

operations.title: List Incidents
operations.description: List all Incidents from ESET Enterprise Server.

operations.title: List Files
operations.description: List all files from ESET Enterprise Server.

parameters.title: Endpoint ID
parameters.name: endpoint_id
parameters.description: Specify the Endpoint ID to submit to isolate endpoint from network.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the Endpoint ID to submit to isolate endpoint from network.

parameters.title: Endpoint ID
parameters.name: endpoint_id
parameters.description: Specify the Endpoint ID to submit to rejoin endpoint from network.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the Endpoint ID to submit to rejoin endpoint from network.
